Package robocode.util

Utility classes that can be used when writing robots.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Collision This class contains more advanced collision detection methods then the original Robocode has.
Coordinates This class is responsible for transforming points into exact coordinates using the AffineTransform class.
Utils Utility class that provide methods for normalizing angles.
 

Package robocode.util Description

Utility classes that can be used when writing robots. Kept for compatibility with legacy robots.
